caption: A SKS wearing a teal harness and leash, standing on a rocky outcrop overlooking a vast, green mountainous landscape.
A SKS looks closely to the camera, with a green grass background.
A SKS has its mouth open and tongue hanging out, standing on green grass.
A SKS perching on the backrest and seat of a dark gray sofa with decorative pillows with leaf and geometric patterns on the sofa.
A SKS sitting on top of a large tree stump in a grassy area. The background is misty, with trees and a path visible in the distance.
A SKS lying on a light-colored floor indoors, in front of a large window with a snowy landscape outside.
A SKS sitting indoors on a sofa with a decorative pillow featuring a leaf pattern. In the background, there are white shutters, a gray blanket, and a green plant.
